Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
71 Sanidassanattika, Cittasahabhūduka
Sanidassanattika, Cittasahabhūduka
117.
283Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
284Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
